Danube Axis States Side With Italy
All Players Can Support With Supplies
Raids May Be Preceeded By Air Battles
notes
property.value:
A mod based on World War II v3 1942 scenario, including a new circular map with additionnal territories and reviewed sea zones, and a set of custom rules for additional (optional) players and nations:
  • French : A neutral power, with some remnants of a colonial empire and a mighty fleet
  • Commonwealth : Dominions of the British Empire, fighting alongside the Allies
  • Neutrals : Neutral and non-belligerent nations, that can join either sides under certain circumstances

Online presentation on A&A forums

Original credits:
Triplelk Jason Clark - baseline
Zero Pilot Mike McCaughey - integration
ComradeKev - custom code and rules
Seidelin - playtesting

Mod credits:
Azimuth - custom map, code and rules (some inspired by Axis & Allies.org Forums)


MAP CHANGES (not updated)

AMERICAS
  • Mexico stretches to both sides of the map and connects to Eastern United States and Sea zones 19 and 20
  • Sea zone 10 is only adjacent to Eastern United States
  • + British West Indies - British, 0 IPC
  • + French West Indies - French, 0 IPC
EUROPE
  • Sea zone 14 is not connected to Sea zone 16 any more
  • Sea zone 16 only covers the Black Sea (closed by Turkish Straits)
  • Romania Bulgaria has no access to sea outside of the Black Sea
  • France - production decreased to 4 IPC
  • Italy - production decreased to 5 IPC
  • Yugoslavia Albania - production decreased to 2 IPC
  • Romania Bulgaria - production increased to 3 IPC
  • Kursk - production increased to 2 IPC
  • + Denmark - German, 1 IPC
  • + Southern France - French, 2 IPC
  • + Greece - Italian, 1 IPC
  • + Sardinia Sicily - Italian, 1 IPC
  • + Portugal - Neutral
  • + Azores - Neutral
AFRICA
  • Italian East Africa has Italy as initial owner
  • French Equatorial Africa and Madagascar have France as initial owner
  • Algeria Tunisia replaces Morocco Algeria - French, 2 IPC
  • + Morocco - French, 1 IPC
  • + British West Africa - British, 1 IPC
  • + Tangier - Neutral
MIDDLE-EAST
  • Iran - production increased to 2 IPC
  • + Syria - British, initially French, 1 IPC
  • + Iraq - British, 2 IPC
ASIA
  • French Indo-China, split off from Thailand - French, 2 IPC
  • Formosa - production decreased to 0 IPC
  • Ryukyu Islands - production decreased to 0 IPC
  • + Thailand - Japanese, 1 IPC
  • + Malaya - Japanese, initially British, 2 IPC
  • + Chosen - Japanese, 1 IPC
  • + Ceylon - British, 0 IPC
  • + Hainan - Japanese, 0 IPC
OCEANIA
  • New Guinea has Commonwealth as initial owner
  • Australia splitted between Western Australia (1 IPC) and Eastern Australia (2 IPC)
  • + New Caledonia - American, initially French, 0 IPC
  • + Fiji - British, 0 IPC
  • + Bora Bora - American, initially French, 0 IPC
  • + Canton - American, 0 IPC
  • + Tutuila - American, 0 IPC
  • + Aleutian Islands - American, 0 IPC


GENERAL RULES CHANGES (WIP)

VICTORY CONDITIONS
  • Cairo (Egypt) and Singapore (Malaya) added as victory cities
    • "Projection of Power": 15 VCs
    • "Honorable Surrender": 17 VCs
    • "Total Victory": 20 VCs
STRAITS
  • ...
